speaker: Alma
dialogue: Thanks for all your hard work! The Captain’s out with the kids doing an egg hunt today.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: I was going to go with them, but the kiddos clung to his arms and kept crying, “But we want Daddy to be the Easter Bunny!”

speaker: Alma
dialogue: You should have seen the Captain’s face! He was so embarrassed. He loves them to pieces, you know.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: It’s okay, though, it gives me time to run the shop. Afterwards I even have time to do my favorite hobby…

speaker: Alma
dialogue: What, you don’t think a gal like me can lift? I’ll have you know I placed first in the county competition!

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Oops! I almost forgot. I have mail for you.

speaker: Alma
dialogue: Tell me… who do you suppose your admirer is?
